AttributeInfo.Name: Client Install Path
AttributeInfo.Description: The path in which the traffic client is installed on the Execution Server. For example 'C:/Program Files (x86)/Ixia/IxOS/6.90-EA'.

AttributeInfo.Name: Controller TCP Port
AttributeInfo.Description: The TCP port of the traffic server. Relevant only in case an external server is configured. Default TCP port should be used if kept empty.
